questions.questionTitle: Who does the man need to speak to?
What is the purpose of the man's phone call?
What does the woman offer to do?

script:
� Enormous Corporation. Mandy Giles speaking.
� Hello. My name is Martin Holt, and I'm calling regarding the newspaper advertisement for a regional manager.
� Yes, Mr. Holt. You'll need to speak to Walter Jennings. He's handling interviews for that position, but he's in a meeting this morning. I'll put you through to his voice mail.
� Thank you. By the way, do you know what time Mr. Jennings will be out of his meeting? I want to make sure I'm available for his call.
